title: Document submission automation
summary: Automated multilingual document intake and validation workflows for court-ready data pipelines.
impact: Reduced manual triage and data entry for legal teams.
Improved traceability and governance across submissions.

title: Case-law text classification
summary: Built classification models to route and prioritize case-law documents for faster review.
impact: Increased consistency in document routing decisions.
Enabled reusable NLP pipelines for new domains.

title: Damages quantification modelling
summary: Designed econometric models for cartel damages estimation in competition cases.
impact: Provided defensible estimates for litigation support.
Streamlined model validation across multiple datasets.

title: End-to-end data automation
summary: Automated ingestion, transformation, and reporting across multi-source datasets.
impact: Significantly improved delivery speed for recurring analyses.
Cut manual QA time with automated checks.

title: Public data processing
summary: Built reusable pipelines for Eurostat, ECB, and IMF datasets.
impact: Enabled faster scenario analysis for economists.
Improved data consistency across client reports.

title: Interactive dashboards
summary: Delivered Shiny and Streamlit dashboards for analytics stakeholders.
impact: Made complex outputs accessible to non-technical users.

title: Litigation risk analysis
summary: Quantified litigation exposure using structured + text data signals.
impact: Supported legal teams with risk scoring insights.
Enhanced narrative reporting with NLP evidence.
